column5: I Thought these were nice looking Pictures   SBK
thats from the hatchery, right? I rented a cottage in inverhuron for a few years and always wanted to go there! nice pics!

They do have tours of the Hatcheries but I'm not sure when & if it worked out I could take a few Guys &/or Girls for a tour as I have a key for the one in Kincardine & could likely get a Tour set up for the Port Elgin Salmon Hatchery if there was enough interest, send me a message if Interested, We could start a post to see if we could pick a Date that works for a few of you SBK
ill see your trout and raise you salmon( see what i did there.."raise you ")  Hows the micro hatch going for the kids?

The Aquarium Hatcheries are going great & the number on your sign is wrong lol, I'm not positive but I think the Kincardine Hatchery is raising about the same as the Port Elgin Hatchery now aren't they, 60,000 Browns & 60,000 Rainbows, lots of video here & hopefully more after tomorrow if I can make it up to help with the fin clipping SBK  http://lhfcschoolhat...s.blogspot.com/
I would love to go for a tour!!
That can be arranged, we are going to be clipping Rainbows this coming weekend,You could tour & Clip if you would like SBK
That sounds fantastic SBK. My son will be up for the weekend and he would love it. Just give me a time and day and I will be there.
